name: Gmail 2: BurnOmania Style II
description:

- Plus Some cosmetic changes.

Hotfix solved bugs due GMAIL changes.

Several minor tweaks & fixes...

- Plus other various tweaks & fixes...

Minor tweaks & fixes...

v0.5
Hotfix solved bugs due GMAIL changes.

NEWS: 18/04
Seems that GMAIL done some changes to their code, i'm working on it... so be patient :)

v0.4
Several minor tweaks & fixes...

Well, here we go with another GMAIL skin.  Based on my first work http://userstyles.org/styles/5077
This time I had to dig deeper and rework a few issues.

Enjoy...

(Segoe UI font is needed)
